nodes.text: Pontel was a city on the planet Naboo inhabited by members of the Human Naboo population. In 32 BBY, around the time of the subjugation of Parrlay during the initial stages of the Invasion of Naboo by the Trade Federation, the Droid Army commander OOM-14 spotted Naboo members near Pontel. The battle droid proceeded to attack the city and secured it for the Trade Federation.

Pontel was set to appear in the 2001 LucasArts video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds within the first level of the Trade Federation campaign, titled "Beachhead," but it was ultimately cut from the final game. Audio regarding OOM-14's attack on the city was still included in the game's files when it was released.
